mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure the navigation menu and booking forms are fully optimized for smaller screens, particularly for users on mobile devices with varying screen sizes.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and reduce large file sizes to improve page load speed, particularly on mobile networks.
seoOptimizationTip: Improve keyword targeting by adding more location-specific terms and relevant long-tail keywords to increase local SEO visibility.
userExperienceTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps required to complete a reservation and improving on-page guidance.
bookingFlowTip: Streamline the booking process by eliminating unnecessary form fields and simplifying the checkout flow to reduce friction.
tips: Focus on improving mobile user experience for faster and more intuitive navigation.
